content:
Yonaaye meen polullkkondaan thanne mrthyu
Moonnaam naall kedenye theeram chertthennonam.

Jeevan poondon paathaallatthil naall moonnollam
Vaanuththhaanaal bhedichullllilninnum vannaan

Srshdikallellaam veeryamezhum ninne uchatthil
Vaazhtthum, nyangallkkaayu kashdappaadelpaan thaazhtthi

Praanan pokki praanan nee thannallo, ninne
Paaril vittoratthaathannum sthuthi roohaaykkum.

Sleebaayaal rakshichavanaam-vallabhane nyaayarnaallil
Vishvaasamezhum paavanamaam-sabha modaal sthuthi paadunnu.
Mrthyuvashanmaar nyaayarnaall-praanadane kabaril kandu
Parikeertthichuththhaanatthe-varavil thanvalamaayu ninnu
Thanne kandaanandippaan-avarettam vaanychhikkunnu.
